justification: “Participants first guessed how much people would donate in general (Guess 1) on a scale of 1 to 300 coins.”
“…following this sequence we again asked participants to report their general expectation for donations (Guess 2).”
“After observing the test sequence, participants first estimated the average donation for the test sequence.”

“To account for individual differences in the prior beliefs, we normalized estimates by subtracting individual guesses prior to the test sequence observation (Guess 2) from the post-observation estimate. These normalized estimates were the main dependent variable of interest.”

measured_by: Regression weight of recent observations on trial-by-trial estimates
justification: “Linear regression showed that estimates were influenced more strongly by more recent observations…”
